general.description: Emperor's Fist is intended to be a new homeworld for the Empire. Work was started shortly after the Incident vaporized old Earth, with plans to terraform this class C planet, chosen for its similar orbital and rotational periods to those of old Earth, into a new Earth-like world. The project is overseen by the Emperor himself, who lives on his personal planet, Emperor's Eye.
general.bar: The bar is clearly designed to harken back to the lost Old Earth, containing various ancient artifacts and even old-school Earth clocks, albeit recalibrated slightly to better match the day length of Emperor's Fist.
